mechanics.condition: Melee spell attack hits a creature within reach
mechanics.outcome: Target takes 3d6 necrotic damage AND Caster regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt
Caster can use an Action to repeat the melee spell attack and its effects (3d6 necrotic damage and half HP regained)

description_text: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt. Until the spell ends, you can make the attack again on each of your turns as an action.
